# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Reporter [italic]This job is primarily for roleplay and not considered as important as other roles.[/italic]
The Reporter is responsible for reporting the news of the station to the rest of the crew. They can achieve this by writing articles for the news feed and broadcasting live on the scene. The Reporter is only available on certain stations.
## Do - Report the news of the station to the rest of the crew. - Broadcast live on the scene of any major events.
